name: The UnPossessed
description:
Submission to Spooktober Jam 2020

You are a ghost stuck to haunt the building you were killed in. The only way to escape is to perform a ritual and sacrifice another to take your place! Lucky for you ghost hunters are investigating the area.

Possess the humans to help accomplish your ritual, find a blade and spill their blood.

Humans that see your ghostly visage will attempt to stop you by placing crucifixes and holy water and will eject you a short distance if you get too close. Holy water can also clean up pools of blood and small portions of created pentagrams. Pentagrams can be created by interacting with multiple pools of blood.

Controls

  • WASD-Move 
  • E - Action(Possess/unpossess person, pickup knife, use knife, build pentagram)
  • Space-Hold to go invisible
  • R - Drop Item
  • P - Return to main menu

Assets Used

  • Horror City sprite pack
  • Music
  • Voices

Created by

  • Bd3n A42PoundMoose vaughnt25 Beniminimin
